official_title: A bill to establish "National Tax Liberation Day" as a legal public holiday.

summary.text: Establishes "National Tax Liberation Day" as a legal public holiday. Sets forth a formula for determining the date of the holiday. Amends the Internal Revenue Code to change the date for the filing of income tax returns from the 15th day of April to National Tax Liberation Day.

titles.title: A bill to establish "National Tax Liberation Day" as a legal public holiday.
